name: Back To Heaven (stanislavstankovic)
description:
For Mini Jam 109: Depth(s)

My first time doing pixelart.My first time doing animations.My first time doing music for my game.My first game ever.My first gamejam.Sorry for any spelling mistakes and bugs.Special thanks for my friend nekopara connoisseur for some ideeas for story and music.

Your goal is to ascend from the depths of the abyss into heaven

Controls:

a - to move left

d - to move right

w- jump

e- double jump

(press p to add feathers: if the game is not possible and you need more double jumps)
